test_cases.title: Verify successful payment with all valid data
preconditions: User must be on the checkout page
steps: Enter valid email 'test@example.com' into the 'emailInput' field.
Enter valid name 'John Doe' into the 'nameInput' field.
Enter valid 16-digit numeric card number '1234567890123456' into the 'cardNumber' field.
Enter a valid expiry date (e.g., '2025-12') into the 'expiryDate' field.
Enter valid 3-digit numeric CVV '123' into the 'cvvInput' field.
Click on the 'Pay Now' button.
test_cases.expected_result: The message 'Payment Successful!' is displayed on the screen.

test_cases.title: Verify validation when 'emailInput' is left empty
preconditions: User must be on the checkout page
steps: Leave the 'emailInput' field empty.
Enter valid name 'John Doe' into the 'nameInput' field.
Enter valid 16-digit numeric card number '1234567890123456' into the 'cardNumber' field.
Enter a valid expiry date (e.g., '2025-12') into the 'expiryDate' field.
Enter valid 3-digit numeric CVV '123' into the 'cvvInput' field.
Click on the 'Pay Now' button.
test_cases.expected_result: An error message indicating email is mandatory is displayed below the 'emailInput' field.
